meta.source: Datamined from Star Citizen game files

items.name: Ana Arms Endro; Ana Legs Endro; Ana Core Endro; Ana Helmet Endro
items.recipe: 1x Carinite (Pure); 1x Antium Core; 1x Antium Helmet; 1x Antium Legs; 1x Antium Arms
items.reward: Ana Arms Endro; Ana Legs Endro; Ana Core Endro; Ana Helmet Endro
items.description: Hello, know many humans want saldynium for regen problem. Credits good, yes, but Wikelo can use that, kopion horn, and other things to make special armor. Once done, you be very tough. Very scary. You see items needed. Bring to and I make for you. Bye.

items.name: Parallax
items.recipe: 10x Carinite; 15x Saldynium (Ore); 1x Parallax Energy Assault Rifle; 20x Tundra Kopion Horn; 20x Jaclium (Ore)
items.description: Hello. Can make fun change to gun if you want. Use kopion skin for pattern and little skull dangle. Very effective. Shoot much better. All you need is bring me parts to and will make. Bye.

items.name: Parallax
items.recipe: 20x Carinite; 30x Saldynium (Ore); 1x Parallax Energy Assault Rifle; 35x Tundra Kopion Horn; 40x Jaclium (Ore)
items.description: Hello. Can make fun change to gun if you want. If you no like saying it not baby skull, have other choice. Use kopion skin for pattern but use tooth instead dangle. Still effective and shoot better. Bring parts to and will make. Bye.

items.name: Parallax
items.recipe: 10x Carinite; 15x Saldynium (Ore); 1x Parallax Energy Assault Rifle; 20x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Juvenile); 20x Jaclium (Ore)
items.description: Hello. Can do version of gun if you kopion soldier. Make material like soldier camouflage but with dead skull on front. Gun shoot better too. If want, bring part to and will make.

items.name: Parallax
items.recipe: 20x Carinite; 30x Saldynium (Ore); 1x Parallax Energy Assault Rifle; 35x Valakkar Fang (Juvenile); 40x Jaclium (Ore)
items.description: Wikelo here with another way to play with type of gun. Make look like more of your soldier gun, but with kopion tooth dangle. Very nasty indeed. If want, bring part to and will make. Bye.

items.name: DCP Armor Helmet Jungle Camo; DCP Armor Core Jungle Camo; DCP Armor Arms Jungle Camo; DCP Armor Legs Jungle Camo
items.recipe: 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 50x Valakkar Fang (Juvenile); 1x ADP-mk4 Core Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Arms Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Legs Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Helmet Woodland; 3x Wikelo Favor
items.reward: DCP Armor Helmet Jungle Camo; DCP Armor Core Jungle Camo; DCP Armor Arms Jungle Camo; DCP Armor Legs Jungle Camo
items.description: Hello. You walk in woods but not want people to know? Wikelo have armor for you. If you bring to , you can get. Interest?

items.name: DCP Armor Helmet Hunter Camo; DCP Armor Core Hunter Camo; DCP Armor Arms Hunter Camo; DCP Armor Legs Hunter Camo
items.mission_name: Look at desert but don't see you
items.recipe: 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 20x Advocacy Badge (Replica); 1x ADP-mk4 Core Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Arms Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Legs Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Helmet Woodland; 3x Wikelo Favor
items.reward: DCP Armor Helmet Hunter Camo; DCP Armor Core Hunter Camo; DCP Armor Arms Hunter Camo; DCP Armor Legs Hunter Camo
items.description: You in hot desert doing things. Need to be sneaky. Don't want seen. Understand. Wikelo give you armor that make you sneaky in sand. Bring things to and I will make. Easy. Bye.

items.name: DCP Armor Helmet Cobalt Camo; DCP Armor Core Cobalt Camo; DCP Armor Arms Cobalt Camo; DCP Armor Legs Cobalt Camo
items.recipe: 3x Wikelo Favor; 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 50x Grassland Quasi Grazer Egg; 1x ADP-mk4 Core Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Arms Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Legs Woodland; 1x ADP-mk4 Helmet Woodland
items.reward: DCP Armor Helmet Cobalt Camo; DCP Armor Core Cobalt Camo; DCP Armor Arms Cobalt Camo; DCP Armor Legs Cobalt Camo
items.description: Know you humans like your navy. Wikelo understand. Very big ships. Powerful too. Wikelo can give armor set that look like navy color. Very easy to make. See what Wikelo need, get and bring to and it will be yours. Wikelo

items.name: Quartz
items.recipe: 30x MG Scrip; 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 50x Grassland Quasi Grazer Egg; 1x Quartz Energy SMG
items.description: Wikelo hearing about new energy weapon by VOLT souli. If you want, Wikelo can make gun look better. It found in storm, it shoot storm, but Wikelo make it better for people who like human navy. Bring things to and Wikelo will do. Bye.

items.name: Quartz
items.recipe: 30x MG Scrip; 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 35x Tundra Kopion Horn; 1x Quartz Energy SMG
items.description: Wikelo hearing about new type of energy weapon by VOLT souli. Hit very hard. If you want, Wikelo can make gun look even better. It found in storm, it shoot storm, but Wikelo make it look woodier. Drop in forest? It gone. Bring things to and Wikelo will do. Bye.

items.name: Quartz
items.recipe: 30x Council Scrip; 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 10x Advocacy Badge (Replica); 1x Quartz Energy SMG
items.description: Wikelo can make new VOLT gun look like sand mound. Very sneaky in desert. Bring things to and Wikelo will do. Bye.

items.name: Bokto Core; Bokto Arms; Bokto Legs; Bokto Helmet
items.recipe: 1x Antium Core; 1x Antium Helmet; 1x Antium Arms; 1x Antium Legs; 1x Irradiated Valakkar Pearl (Grade AAA)
items.reward: Bokto Core; Bokto Arms; Bokto Legs; Bokto Helmet
items.description: Wikelo had exciting idea during brief work rest. Was thinking about the little glow worms in Pyro and saw armor get changed to look like. If you get me parts, bring to and will make for you then you can glow too. Bye.

items.name: Prism
items.recipe: 10x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Adult); 5x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Juvenile); 1x Prism Laser Shotgun
items.description: You feel like gun not angry enough? VOLT shotgun very powerful, very dangerous, but not scary? Bring to me. Can make very scary and angry. They respect you then. Bring to and we make. Bye.

items.name: Novikov
items.recipe: 1x Novikov Helmet; 30x MG Scrip; 10x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Adult); 20x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Juvenile); 1x Irradiated Valakkar Pearl (Grade AAA); 1x Novikov Exploration Suit
items.description: Maybe you like walking on planet that very hot. Or very cold. Or many rocks. Wikelo can make suit called Novikov from Human souli Caldera work better for you. Bring things if you want, then I make. Bye.

items.name: Xanthule Ascension Suit; Xanthule Ascension Helmet
items.recipe: 1x Xanthule Helmet; 10x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 1x Tevarin War Service Marker (Pristine); 20x MG Scrip; 1x Xanthule Suit
items.reward: Xanthule Ascension Suit; Xanthule Ascension Helmet
items.description: Wikelo like Syang souli very much. Make very line-y flight suits that very useful. Can even make suits a little prettier if you want. Bring things, I do.

items.name: Venture Core Ascension; Venture Arms Ascension; Venture Legs Ascension; Venture Helmet Ascension
items.recipe: 1x Venture Core; 1x Venture Helmet White; 1x Venture Legs; 30x MG Scrip; 10x Saldynium (Ore); 20x Jaclium (Ore); 1x Carinite (Pure); 1x Venture Arms
items.reward: Venture Core Ascension; Venture Arms Ascension; Venture Legs Ascension; Venture Helmet Ascension
items.description: You like adventure, right? This armor good for it. Let you go dangerous places, but not too heavy. Stay light. Wikelo found these and will trade if you want. You win, Wikelo win. Bye.

items.name: Karna
items.recipe: 10x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Juvenile); 10x Irradiated Kopion Horn; 10x Irradiated Valakkar Fang (Adult); 1x Irradiated Valakkar Pearl (Grade AAA); 1x Karna Rifle
items.description: Wikelo friend had to trade ship they found for credits. Wikelo surprised to find many crate of Karna guns inside. Friend must not have wanted. Anyway, Wikelo figure out how to make prettier. If you want, bring stuff. Bye.

items.name: S71
items.recipe: 10x Carinite; 10x Saldynium (Ore); 10x Jaclium (Ore); 1x Carinite (Pure); 1x S71 Rifle
items.description: Universe is dangerous in human space. Good to have a good weapon to handle bad situation. Wikelo don't have many weapon, but can make useful ones more useful. If you want, bring stuff and I will do.

items.name: Coda
items.recipe: 5x Ace Interceptor Helmet; 1x Tevarin War Service Marker (Pristine); 30x MG Scrip; 1x Coda Pistol
items.description: Wikelo found crate of Coda pistols. Very strange reason, but will tell later if you want to hear. Anyway, after study have figured out nice way to make gun look better. Have a look, see if interested. Bye.

items.name: Zenith
items.recipe: 7x ASD Secure Drive; 1x Zenith Laser Sniper Rifle
items.description: Want to shoot long away and stay hiding. But it snowing? Wikelo have gun for you. Bring things. I give. Bye.

items.name: Geist Armor Arms Snow Camo; Geist Armor Core Snow Camo; Geist Armor Helmet Snow Camo; Geist Armor Legs Snow Camo; Geist Backpack Snow Camo
items.recipe: 4x ASD Secure Drive; 1x Geist Armor Arms ASD Edition; 1x Geist Armor Core ASD Edition; 1x Geist Armor Helmet ASD Edition; 1x Geist Armor Legs ASD Edition; 1x Geist Backpack ASD Edition
items.reward: Geist Armor Arms Snow Camo; Geist Armor Core Snow Camo; Geist Armor Helmet Snow Camo; Geist Armor Legs Snow Camo; Geist Backpack Snow Camo
items.description: You want be hidden. Wikelo understand. Not ask questions why. But what do when you in snow? Wikelo have suit for that. Welcome.

items.name: Fresnel
items.recipe: 5x ASD Secure Drive; 5x RCMBNT-XTL-1; 5x RCMBNT-XTL-2; 5x RCMBNT-XTL-3; 1x Fresnel Energy LMG
items.description: You need useful weapon. Yes, yes, understand. Wikelo make useful weapon more beautiful too. You see things I need. You bring? I do. Bye.

items.name: Strata Core Heatwave; Strata Arms Heatwave; Strata Legs Heatwave; Strata Helmet Heatwave; Strata Backpack Heatwave
items.recipe: 30x Carinite; 4x RCMBNT-PWL-1; 4x RCMBNT-PWL-2; 4x RCMBNT-PWL-3; 1x Strata Arms; 1x Strata Legs; 1x Strata Helmet; 1x Strata Backpack; 1x Strata Core
items.reward: Strata Core Heatwave; Strata Arms Heatwave; Strata Legs Heatwave; Strata Helmet Heatwave; Strata Backpack Heatwave
items.description: If you have armor, Wikelo can make it look warm. Good look for useful armor. Bring me things and will do.

items.name: Corbel Helmet Crush; Corbel Core Crush; Corbel Arms Crush; Corbel Legs Crush; Novikov Backpack Crush
items.recipe: 1x Corbel Core Mire; 1x Corbel Arms Mire; 1x Corbel Legs Mire; 1x Novikov Backpack Mire; 10x ASD Secure Drive; 5x RCMBNT-RGL-1; 5x RCMBNT-RGL-2; 5x RCMBNT-RGL-3; 1x Corbel Helmet Mire
items.reward: Corbel Helmet Crush; Corbel Core Crush; Corbel Arms Crush; Corbel Legs Crush; Novikov Backpack Crush
items.description: You need utility suit. Good for work. If you like, Wikelo can make shinier. Look real good. See what Wikelo need and bring.

items.name: XDL "Mark I" Monocular Rangefinder
items.recipe: 1x Wikelo Favor; 2x Yormandi Eye; 1x Yormandi Tongue
items.description: Wikelo has best eyes for seeing far away. I give to you if you give me

items.name: Fresnel
items.recipe: 6x Yormandi Eye; 3x Yormandi Tongue; 1x Fresnel Energy LMG
items.description: This gun has picture of amazing creature on side. Use it and it make you big and strong like Yormandi. Spit lightning. Bring my items and then you get it. Bye.

items.name: F55 "Mark I" LMG
items.recipe: 1x F55 LMG; 4x Yormandi Eye; 2x Yormandi Tongue; 20x Carinite
items.description: Sometimes you shoot people, but if you are last thing they see before dead gun should look amazing, right? Wikelo will make your gun look much better. Bring me items I need and then I give you the gun. Bye.

items.name: Palatino Helmet Mark I; Palatino Arms Mark I; Palatino Legs Mark I; Palatino Core Mark I; Palatino Backpack Mark I
items.recipe: 14x Yormandi Eye; 7x Yormandi Tongue; 1x Palatino Helmet; 1x Palatino Arms; 1x Palatino Legs; 1x Palatino Core; 1x Palatino Backpack
items.reward: Palatino Helmet Mark I; Palatino Arms Mark I; Palatino Legs Mark I; Palatino Core Mark I; Palatino Backpack Mark I
items.description: Bring me armor and other things and I give you special test armor. First version. Very special. Bring and I give. Bye.

items.name: Testudo Helmet Clanguard; Testudo Arms Clanguard; Testudo Core Clanguard; Testudo Legs Clanguard; Testudo Backpack Clanguard
items.recipe: 15x Vanduul Plating; 15x Vanduul Metal; 1x Testudo Legs Turfwar; 1x Testudo Helmet Turfwar; 1x Testudo Core Turfwar; 1x Testudo Arms Turfwar; 1x Testudo Backpack Turfwar
items.reward: Testudo Helmet Clanguard; Testudo Arms Clanguard; Testudo Core Clanguard; Testudo Legs Clanguard; Testudo Backpack Clanguard
items.description: Vanduul have strange ways. I never talk to them, old souli used to, but not Wikelo. Anyway, though not friendly, they make interesting thing. If you like, Wikelo can make you look more like. Bring things. Will do. Bye.

items.name: Boomtube
items.recipe: 2x Vanduul Plating; 2x Vanduul Metal; 1x Boomtube Rocket Launcher
items.description: Wikelo find very strange but functional weapon while wandering through your systems. It very simple but very effective. If you bring me things, I show you what I do to it. Very fun.

items.name: Tripledown
items.recipe: 20x Carinite; 20x Bluemoon Fungus; 1x Tripledown Pistol
items.description: You need a good weapon, yes? Have one for you. Small but powerful. Like an extra spicy balalu pepper. Wikelo make this pistol look extra spicy too. You bring things I need and I do a trade. Bye.

items.name: Very Hungry
items.recipe: 1x Berry Blend Smoothie; 1x Ermer Family Farms Fat Free Ice Cream
items.description: You humans keep Wikelo very busy. Work more than when I at old souli. But Wikelo very hungry now and can't get food. Please help. Bring food and drink to Wikelo Emporium at . Very appreciate your help. Will give thing in return. Bye.

intro_mission.name: Wikelo Arrive to System
intro_mission.description: Hello, I am Wikelo. Recent addition to your system and very excited to be here. Spent many time here in UEE and happy to spent more. Have place where I make things from other things. Need person to bring me useful things to finish project I work on. You have list. Get, please. I am at . Will give you item for your help. Also, when done, if you want to do more. Have many things can make in my humble shop. Come, look at pretty poster and then decide what you want me to make. Bye.

currency_exchanges.description: Have new way to get favors from Wikelo. Hear much about worm things in radiation storms. Made up of many interesting parts that Wikelo find use for. If you bring parts to , will trade for favor. Bye.

Wikelo has another way to get favors if you interested. Your Mercenary souli has scrip metal, used like favors, but made of very interesting metal that Wikelo need for new project. If you bring scrips to , will trade for favor. Bye.

If you want other way to get favors from Wikelo, have thing for you. Wikelo have need for scrip given out by Council group. Wikelo not part of thief souli, but has business from time to time. If you bring scrips to , will trade for favor. Bye.

Maybe Wikelo not have something you want made (that strange, but okay). Old souli would give out favors, very good way to prove that you do work for me. Collect enough and trade when I have something you want. Bring things to and will trade for favor. Bye.

Wikelo need large amounts of quantanium and is willing to give you nice Polaris in exchange but also know many humans not have much space, so you trade as you go. Wikelo will you Polaris bits if you want trade quantanium. Work like favors. Help Wikelo remember how much you give. Bring quantanium to and will trade for bits. Bye.

entries.mission_title: Look at desert but don't see you
Now make Polaris. Short Time Deal.
